stack.description: This stack contains packages that make the Stanford Whole-Body Control framework available within ROS. In particular, the wbc_core package is a thin wrapper around the core Stanford_WBC library, and the wbc_pr2_ctrl package contains a controller plugin and other utilities to run the whole-body controller on PR2 (simulated or real).
